Insider Trading.name: Insider Trading
Insider Trading.desc: All stamps cost 5% less coins to upgrade.

Tracking Chips.name: Tracking Chips
Tracking Chips.desc: Stamps drop +15% more often from monsters and resources that drop stamps.

Mandatory Fire Sale.name: Mandatory Fire Sale
Mandatory Fire Sale.desc: All shop items cost 7% less coins.

Sleeping on the Job.name: Sleeping on the Job
Sleeping on the Job.desc: Boosts fighting AFK Gains Rate by +5%

Artificial Demand.name: Artificial Demand
Artificial Demand.desc: Items sell to shops for +10% more than their normal value.

The Art of the Deal.name: The Art of the Deal
The Art of the Deal.desc: Unlocks the next set of 7 Bribes to be purchased.

Overstock Regulations.name: Overstock Regulations
Overstock Regulations.desc: Item Quantity in all shops increased by +20%. Takes effect only after Shops restock.

Double Exp Scheme.name: Double Exp Scheme
Double Exp Scheme.desc: Whenever you claim AFK rewards, there is a 2.2% chance to get x2 EXP.

Tagged Indicators.name: Tagged Indicators
Tagged Indicators.desc: Stamps drop +20% more often. Stacks with previous bribe of this type.

Fossil Fuel Legislation.name: Fossil Fuel Legislation
Fossil Fuel Legislation.desc: Oil Barrel consumption chance is reduced to 80% of the original chance.

Five Aces in the Deck.name: Five Aces in the Deck
Five Aces in the Deck.desc: Card drop rate boosted by 1.20x for all areas of the game.

Fake Teleport Tickets.name: Fake Teleport Tickets
Fake Teleport Tickets.desc: Get +2 Map Teleport every 24 hours. Caps at 6, so being gone for 4 days only gives 6 tele.

The Art of the Steal.name: The Art of the Steal
The Art of the Steal.desc: Unlocks the next set of 7 Bribes to be purchased.

Counterfeit Telepassports.name: Counterfeit Telepassports
Counterfeit Telepassports.desc: You now get +4 Map Teleports every 24 hours, and caps at 12 before you need to login.

Weighted Marbles.name: Weighted Marbles
Weighted Marbles.desc: +10% arcade balls recharge rate. You'll be drowning in balls in no time!

Changing the Code.name: Changing the Code
Changing the Code.desc: Unlock the 2nd Alchemy Bubble slot for ALL players. Don't go tellin' Lava 'bout this one...

Guild VIP Fraud.name: Guild VIP Fraud
Guild VIP Fraud.desc: Logging in each day now contributes 20 GP to your guild, instead of the normal 10.

Library Double Agent.name: Library Double Agent
Library Double Agent.desc: +4 minimum Lv for all Talent Books from the library, so you get more of the goood stuff.

The Art of the Fail.name: The Art of the Fail
The Art of the Fail.desc: Unlocks the next set of 7 Bribes to be purchased.

AFKeylogging.name: AFKeylogging
AFKeylogging.desc: Boosts Skill AFK Gains Rate by +2%.

Guild GP Hack.name: Guild GP Hack
Guild GP Hack.desc: Logging in each day now contributes 30 GP to your guild, instead of 20.

The Art of the Bail.name: The Art of the Bail
The Art of the Bail.desc: Look, I'm in a bit of a situation right now and need time to clean it up... come back later.
